title: Lag spikes
body:
Hey, all. 

My desktop has been broken for some time, so I've decided to play on my laptop. The problem is, I get lag spikes ONLY during team fights, and the longer the game lasts, the more intense the spikes get. While running around alone in lane, my ping is 28 MS. The second I engage in combat, it jumps anywhere from 115-500 MS. My framerate is always high, and doesn't change during the spike. I have tried changing my DNS server, as well as editing some of the network adapter settings, and changing some settings in gpedit. (it did help a tiny bit)

Has anyone ever experienced this before? Is there a fix? 

Thank you

replies.body: Your connection seems to be degrading or experiencing packet loss.  Run through the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an analysis of these games, and let me know what you find!
